title: Daughters of the Flame
description: He thought love could be possessed...So Adam Hartshorn purchased his 17-year-old bride for the price of a circus. HE tried to tame the beautiful wild child with money, luxury, passion -- and unleashed a tigress who taught him a new meaning for the word woman.She thought happiness could be bought...So Carisa Phillips, the most tempestuous of all the Flying Flambeaux, made a devil's bargain and married a total stranger. Now she would carry on the dazzling tradition that had bred her for glory. Now she would be absolute monarch o her own circus. Now she would ride destiny to the top of a brawling, lusty, man's world--but at a price not even her psychic powers could have foretold!
author: Julia Grice
